meta_description: Some interesting information from the South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control: SCDHEC responds to emails from concerned South Carolina residents. Should I be concerned about going to public places like the grocery store? Transmission of the illness requires significant close contact with an ill individual. Brief contact in a public setting is not…
